subject: Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Coach Mike Fratello was the Grizzlies’ career leader in victories with a 95-83 record, and he guided Memphis to two consecutive playoff appearances.
snippet: Coach Mike Fratello was the Grizzlies’ career leader in victories with a 95-83 record, and he guided Memphis to two consecutive playoff appearances.
